Instance.description: Situation used when a patient has an Emergency that a doctor needs to address on top of all of the doctors other daily duties.

Tunable.name: force_patient_on_active_career_sim
Tunable.display: Force Patient On Active Career Sim
Tunable.description: If true then the patient will be the active career sim, otherwise we will let the filter service select a sim.

Tunable.name: procedure_duration_for_time_jump
Tunable.description: The amount of time allowed to pass before a Sim in the procedure state will be ignored on load with a time jump.

Tunable.name: procedure_role_state
Tunable.description: A reference to the hospital patients diagnosed role state while in the situation. This is the state where the patient has been diagnosed but it still waiting for the doctor to treat them.
